original_text: If ye will fear the Lord, and serve him, and obey his voice, and not rebel against the commandment of the Lord, then shall both ye and also the king that reigneth over you continue following the Lord your God:
korean_text: 너희가 만일 여호와를 경외하여 그를 섬기며 그의 목소리를 듣고 여호와의 명령을 거역하지 아니하며 또 너희와 너희를 다스리는 왕이 너희의 하나님 여호와를 따르면 좋겠지마는

sentences.original_text: If ye will fear the Lord
and not rebel against the commandment of the Lord
then shall both ye and also the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너희와 너희 위에 다스리는 왕이

sentences.original_text: continue following the Lord your God:
